description: Summary of PCI DSS v4.0 Articles (Requirements 1-12, Appendices A1/A2, A3)

sections.title: Master Table of Contents
content: Requirement 1 - Install and Maintain Network Security Controls
Requirement 2 - Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components
Requirement 4 - Protect Cardholder Data with Strong Cryptography During Transmission
Requirement 5 - Protect Systems and Networks from Malicious Software
Requirement 6 - Develop and Maintain Secure Systems and Software
Requirement 7 - Restrict Access by Business Need to Know
Requirement 8 - Identify and Authenticate Access to System Components
Requirement 9 - Restrict Physical Access to Cardholder Data
Requirement 10 - Log and Monitor All Access to System Components and Data
Requirement 11 - Test Security of Systems and Networks Regularly
Requirement 12 - Support Information Security with Organizational Policies and Programs
Appendix A1/A2 - Shared Hosting Providers and SSL/Early TLS for POI Systems
Appendix A3 - PCI DSS Compliance Program Maturity and Governance

content.Requirement 1: Establish and maintain strong network security perimeters.
content.Requirement 2: Secure system configurations across all assets.
content.Requirement 3: Encrypt and protect stored cardholder data.
content.Requirement 4: Secure transmissions of cardholder data over open networks.
content.Requirement 6: Embed security into software development and maintenance.
content.Requirement 7: Limit access based on business need to know.
content.Requirement 8: Authenticate and track all users accessing systems.
content.Requirement 9: Physically protect systems and cardholder data locations.
content.Requirement 10: Log all access and monitor system activities for anomalies.
content.Requirement 11: Scan, test, and validate security continuously.
content.Requirement 12: Create and maintain policies and a governance structure.
content.Appendix A1/A2: Additional controls for shared hosting and legacy SSL/TLS POI systems.
content.Appendix A3: Formalize compliance governance and continuous lifecycle practices.
